name: Gloria's Lemon Brownies (Lemonies)
author: Holly Fries
summary: Very moist lemon bars with all the real stuff without processed ingredients!
ingredients: ¾ cup unsalted butter, melted and cooled to room temperature
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease an 8-inch square baking pan, or line it with parchment paper or nonstick aluminum foil
Whisk flour, sugar, lemon zest, salt, and baking powder together in a large bowl
Add butter, eggs, lemon juice, and vanilla extract; stir until completely combined
Pour batter into the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 20 to 25 minutes
Cool on a wire rack until completely cool, about 30 minutes
Meanwhile, mix confectioners' sugar, lemon juice, and lemon zest together for glaze in a bowl
Pour glaze over the brownies and leave at room temperature until glaze has hardened, about 20 minutes
